response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. Our product, which I believe holds immense value for you, is now available for consideration. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it is worth $800,000 to you. I am offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer is designed to provide you with the best possible value while ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this acquisition for you.", "product_price": 950000}
